overview:
Todd Oâ€™Hara is the founder and CEO of Toodalu where he leads business development. Before starting Toodalu, Todd was a derivatives trader at Marquette Partners in Chicago where he specialized in developing automated trading systems in highly correlated markets. The systems he developed were grey-box trading solutions for low-latency platforms spanning multiple asset classes. Todd has a degree from Colby College where he studied Economics and Mathematics. A Minneapolis native, Todd is a passionate graphic designer.

via toodalu.com
